data.eml:eml: Two new species in the annelid genus Stygocapitella (Orbiniida, Parergodrilidae) with comments on their biogeography

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Struck, Torsten H., Koczula, Jens, Stateczny, Dave, Meyer, Christian, Purschke, Günter (2017): Two new species in the annelid genus Stygocapitella (Orbiniida, Parergodrilidae) with comments on their biogeography. Zootaxa 4286 (3): 301-332, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4286.3.1
